item.title: Facade Pattern
item.description: The Facade Design Pattern provides a simplified interface to a complex subsystem. It offers an easy-to-use API while hiding the complexities of underlying systems. In software systems, this allows clients to perform operations with minimal code, while still enabling power users to access lower-level functionality when needed. In this example, a Console class is implemented as a facade to manage Buffer and Viewport components, which handle the complexity of text manipulation in a console-based system.
